solution_line_template: If half-hour lesson is worth ${cost_per_half_hour}, then a one-hour lesson costs {half_hours_per_hour} * {cost_per_half_hour} = $<<{cost_per_half_hour}*{half_hours_per_hour}={cost_per_hour_lesson}>>{cost_per_hour_lesson}.
One lesson per week would mean that in {num_weeks} weeks the teacher would earn {cost_per_hour_lesson} * {num_weeks} = $<<{cost_per_hour_lesson}*{num_weeks}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
